column4: After upgrading to 10.04, after booting has ended, vt7 is just the purple ubuntu screen, and there are no consoles connected to vt1-6. So how do I go about fixing my ubuntu without being able to login?
not sure bout your particular issue, but I've used a livecd to resolve issues on broken installs
ah, I don't have one. Guess I'll have to make one at work tomorrow. thanks for the idea.
